validationRules.block_id: Required, must be unique 4-character hex identifier
validationRules.Title: Required, main message text
validationRules.Description: Boolean toggle, must be true to show descText
validationRules.descText: Only visible if Description is true
validationRules.IconName: Requires icon: true, use Font Awesome class names (e.g., 'fas fa-check-circle')
validationRules.dismsIcon: Requires dismiss: true, Font Awesome class for close button
validationRules.msgArrow: Boolean toggle for arrow pointer, typically false for standard alerts
validationRules.titleTypo.openTypography: Must be 1 to enable typography controls
validationRules.descTypo.openTypography: Must be 1 to enable description typography controls
validationRules.titleNmlBG.bgGradient: Required if bgType is 'gradient', must include gradientType, gradientAngle, gradientColor array
validationRules.titleNmlShadow.openShadow: Must be 1 to enable shadow effects
validationRules.iconSize/iconWidth: Use responsive objects with md/sm/xs breakpoints

warnings: Description toggle must be true to show descText content
icon toggle must be true to show IconName
dismiss toggle must be true to show dismsIcon close button
icnPosition 'suffix' places icon after title (uncommon for alerts)
msgArrow is typically false for standard message boxes (used for tooltip-style callouts)
titleNmlColor and titleHvrColor require separate values for hover effect
titleNmlBG and titleHvrBG support both solid colors and gradients
openTypography must be 1 before setting fontSize, fontWeight, etc.
openShadow must be 1 before setting shadow values
bgNormalColor sets overall message box background (title/desc have separate backgrounds)
titleAdjust/descAdjust control padding (spacing inside), titleMargin/descMargin control margin (spacing outside)
iconWidth sets both width AND height (creates square container)
Hover states (titleHvrColor, descHvrColor, etc.) require interaction - ensure they're visually distinct
descNmlBRadius and descHvrBRadius typically set bottom corners only (top corners handled by title)
Font Awesome icons require Font Awesome to be loaded on the site
commonMistakes: Setting descText without enabling Description: true (text won't display)
Setting IconName without enabling icon: true (icon won't display)
Setting dismsIcon without enabling dismiss: true (close button won't display)
Using icnPosition: 'suffix' when expecting icon before title (use 'prefix')
Enabling msgArrow for standard alerts (creates visual clutter)
Not setting titleNmlColor/descNmlColor (text may not be readable against background)
Setting hover colors identical to normal colors (no visible hover effect)
Forgetting openTypography: 1 when setting typography (settings ignored)
Using px units for icon sizes on responsive sites (consider rem/em)
Setting titleAdjust when you meant titleMargin (affects spacing differently)
Setting iconSize without iconWidth (icon may appear distorted)
Using gradient backgrounds without setting bgType: 'gradient'
Setting shadow values without openShadow: 1 (shadow won't appear)
Not testing hover states (they require user interaction to see)
Overusing dismiss: false on important messages (users can't close them)
bestPractices: Use semantic color schemes: green for success, yellow for warnings, red for errors, blue for info
Always pair titleNmlColor with bgNormalColor for sufficient contrast (WCAG 4.5:1 ratio)
Keep Title text concise (1-2 sentences max) - use Description for longer content
Use icon: true with appropriate icons to reinforce message type (check for success, warning triangle for warnings, etc.)
Enable dismiss: true for non-critical messages, disable for critical alerts that require action
Set titleTypo.fontWeight to 600-700 for emphasis on important messages
Use descTypo.lineHeight between 1.5-1.8 for readability
Set responsive typography (md/sm/xs) for titles on mobile devices
Use msgArrow: true only for tooltip-style callouts, false for standard alert boxes
Provide hover effects (titleHvrColor, titleHvrBG) for interactive messages
Use titleAdjust/descAdjust to control internal spacing, ensuring text doesn't touch edges (12-20px recommended)
Set iconSize proportional to titleTypo.fontSize (icon ~1.5x title font size works well)
Use iconWidth for circular icon containers (e.g., iconWidth: 40, iconSize: 20 creates 40px circle with 20px icon)
Test dismissible functionality - ensure dismsIcon is visible and clickable
Keep gradient angles consistent across normal/hover states (typically 135deg or 180deg)
Use box shadows (titleNmlShadow) sparingly - subtle shadows (blur 8-12, vertical 2-4) look professional
Increase shadow on hover (titleHvrShadow) for depth effect (vertical 4-6, blur 16-20)
Set descNmlBRadius bottom corners only to create unified message box appearance
Use text-only messages (icon: false) for formal announcements and policy updates
Avoid excessive uppercase text (titleTypo.textTransform) - reduces readability

iconPositions.prefix: Icon appears before title (standard for most alerts - check icons, warning triangles, info circles)
iconPositions.suffix: Icon appears after title (uncommon, used for announcements with megaphones, special callouts)

messageTypes.withIcon: icon: true - Standard for alerts that need visual reinforcement (success, warning, error, info)
messageTypes.textOnly: icon: false - Used for formal announcements, policy updates, simple notifications where icon is unnecessary

dismissibility.dismissible: dismiss: true - User can close the message (non-critical alerts, tips, promotional messages)
dismissibility.persistent: dismiss: false - Message cannot be closed (critical alerts, required actions, important announcements)

contentLayout.titleOnly: Description: false - Single-line message, quick alerts, status updates
contentLayout.titleWithDescription: Description: true - Multi-line content, detailed explanations, instructions, long-form notifications

mobileFriendlyAlert.description: Reduce padding and font sizes on mobile devices

largeScreenCallout.description: Increase visual prominence on desktop with larger typography and spacing

accessibilityNotes: Ensure titleNmlColor has sufficient contrast against bgNormalColor (WCAG 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text)
Use semantic icon choices (check for success, triangle for warning, X for error, i for info) to reinforce message meaning
Provide text alternatives - don't rely solely on color to convey meaning (use icons and clear titles)
Make dismiss buttons large enough to tap on mobile (minimum 44x44px touch target)
Use titleTypo.fontSize minimum 14px for readability (16px recommended for body text)
Avoid red/green color combinations only (color blind users) - use icons to differentiate
Test hover states with keyboard navigation, not just mouse
Ensure dismsIcon is keyboard accessible (can be closed with Enter/Space)
Use clear, action-oriented Title text (e.g., 'Error: Form submission failed' not just 'Error')
Set appropriate ARIA roles via WordPress (message boxes typically use role='alert' or role='status')
Avoid auto-dismissing critical messages - let users control when to close
Test with screen readers - icon-only messages should have aria-label
Ensure sufficient spacing (titleAdjust) so text doesn't feel cramped
performanceConsiderations: Use dismiss: true for one-time messages to prevent repeated displays (store dismissal in localStorage)
Avoid overly complex gradients (titleNmlBG/titleHvrBG) on pages with many message boxes
Limit box shadow blur values (8-20px) to prevent rendering performance issues
Use CSS transitions for hover effects instead of animations (better performance)
Minimize DOM reflows by setting fixed iconWidth/iconSize instead of auto
Use Font Awesome strategically - loading entire library for a few icons impacts performance (consider SVG icons)
Cache message box HTML if content is static (don't regenerate on every page load)
Use msgArrow: false when possible (arrow rendering adds slight overhead)
Limit the number of visible message boxes per page (1-3 recommended, stack if more needed)
Test hover state transitions on mobile (some devices struggle with complex :hover CSS)
Optimize gradient color stops - 2-3 colors maximum for smooth rendering
Use descNmlBRadius sparingly on complex messages (border-radius can impact paint performance)
Avoid excessive padding (titleAdjust/descAdjust) on mobile - increases scroll height
Lazy load message boxes below the fold to improve initial page load

integrationPatterns.formValidationAlerts: Use tp-messagebox for inline form validation - red error for invalid fields, green success for valid submissions. Place immediately above or below form blocks.
integrationPatterns.cookieConsentNotices: Use dismissible message box (dismiss: true) at page top/bottom with description for cookie policy text. Set icon: false for cleaner appearance.
integrationPatterns.accountDashboards: Display system status messages (server updates, billing alerts, feature announcements) at dashboard top. Use appropriate color schemes and icons.
integrationPatterns.ecommerceCheckout: Show order confirmation (success), payment errors (red), shipping delays (warning) during checkout flow. Make critical messages persistent (dismiss: false).
integrationPatterns.membershipSites: Welcome new members with blue info box, warn expiring subscriptions with yellow warning, celebrate upgrades with green success.
integrationPatterns.blogPosts: Use as editorial callouts within content - highlight important notes, warn about outdated information, provide tips and recommendations.
integrationPatterns.landingPages: Feature limited-time offers with advanced hover states, gradient backgrounds, and urgency messaging (countdown integration).
integrationPatterns.documentationSites: Show version update notices, deprecation warnings, breaking change alerts with clear titles and detailed descriptions.
